content: I've been trying to stay motivated by tracking my progress using a fitness app, which has been really helpful. It's nice to see that I've increased my daily step count by about 20% over the past month. My goal is to reach 10,000 steps per day, and I'm hoping to get there by the end of the month. Do you have any tips on how to increase my daily step count, especially on days when I'm stuck at my desk?
